verses.verse: A Psalm of David <WH1732>, Maschil <WH4905> <WH8688>. Blessed <WH835> is he whose transgression <WH6588> is forgiven <WH5375> <WH8803>, whose sin <WH2401> is covered <WH3680> <WH8803>.
Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> unto whom the YY <WH3068> imputeth <WH2803> <WH8799> not iniquity <WH5771>, and in whose spirit <WH7307> there is no guile <WH7423>.
When I kept silence <WH2790> <WH8689>, my bones <WH6106> waxed old <WH1086> <WH8804> through my roaring <WH7581> all the day <WH3117> long.

For day <WH3119> and night <WH3915> thy hand <WH3027> was heavy <WH3513> <WH8799> upon me: my moisture <WH3955> is turned <WH2015> <WH8738> into the drought <WH2725> of summer <WH7019>. Selah <WH5542>.

I acknowledged <WH3045> <WH8686> my sin <WH2403> unto thee, and mine iniquity <WH5771> have I not hid <WH3680> <WH8765>. I said <WH559> <WH8804>, I will confess <WH3034> <WH8686> my transgressions <WH6588> unto the YY <WH3068>; and thou forgavest <WH5375> <WH8804> the iniquity <WH5771> of my sin <WH2403>. Selah <WH5542>.

For this shall every one that is godly <WH2623> pray <WH6419> <WH8691> unto thee in a time <WH6256> when thou mayest be found <WH4672> <WH8800>: surely in the floods <WH7858> of great <WH7227> waters <WH4325> they shall not come nigh <WH5060> <WH8686> unto him.

Thou art my hiding place <WH5643>; thou shalt preserve <WH5341> <WH8799> me from trouble <WH6862>; thou shalt compass <WH5437> <WH8779> me about with songs <WH7438> of deliverance <WH6405>. Selah <WH5542>.
I will instruct <WH7919> <WH8686> thee and teach <WH3384> <WH8686> thee in the way <WH1870> which <WH2098> thou shalt go <WH3212> <WH8799>: I will guide <WH3289> <WH8799> thee with mine eye <WH5869>.

Be ye not as the horse <WH5483>, or as the mule <WH6505>, which have no understanding <WH995> <WH8687>: whose mouth <WH5716> must be held <WH1102> <WH8800> in with bit <WH4964> and bridle <WH7448>, lest <WH1077> they come near <WH7126> <WH8800> unto thee.
Many <WH7227> sorrows <WH4341> shall be to the wicked <WH7563>: but he that trusteth <WH982> <WH8802> in the YY <WH3068>, mercy <WH2617> shall compass <WH5437> <WH8779> him about.
Be glad <WH8055> <WH8798> in the YY <WH3068>, and rejoice <WH1523> <WH8798>, ye righteous <WH6662>: and shout <WH7442> <WH8685> for joy, all ye that are upright <WH3477> in heart <WH3820>.
